sn35.143:1.2: The cause and condition that gives rise to sights is also impermanent.
sn35.143:1.3: Since sights are produced by what is impermanent, how could they be permanent?
sn35.143:1.9: The cause and condition that gives rise to thoughts is also impermanent.
sn35.143:1.10: Since thoughts are produced by what is impermanent, how could they be permanent?
sn35.143:1.12: They understand: ‘… there is no return to any state of existence.’”
